channel.title: My Team Performance
channel.description: This report contains sales achievement and their quota for next two months

item.title: Sales Performance Indicator (Week 9)
item.description: It summarizes the performance and quota of your team for next two months This report will be generated weekly to and sent to the corresponding Sales Managers for evaluation purpose
item.author: eBusiness.AEU@Advantech.eu

item.title: All Opportunity for next two months (Week 9)
item.description: It lists all opportunity which may be obtained by your team member for next two months
item.author: eBusiness.AEU@Advantech.eu

item.title: Big Deal Opportunity (Week 9)
item.description: It lists only opportunity with amount morethan 200.000 for next two month
item.author: eBusiness.AEU@Advantech.eu
